class SegmentPlotter:

    @staticmethod
    def plot_segment(segment: DetectedSegment) -> None:
        """Display a plot of the RMS values for a single DetectedSegment."""
        # Extract RMS data and time axis
        rms = segment.rms_segment
        if rms.ndim != 1:
            rms = rms.squeeze()
        fps = 30  # assumed frame rate for time conversion
        hop_len = RMS_HOP_LENGTH
        frame_len = RMS_FRAME_LENGTH
        # Compute time per sample based on hop length
        times = np.arange(len(rms)) * hop_len / fps
        # Create the plot
        plt.figure(figsize=(8, 3))
        plt.plot(times, rms, label=f"Segment {segment.id} ({segment.label.value})")
        plt.xlabel("Time (seconds)")
        plt.ylabel("RMS")
        plt.title(f"RMS Plot for Segment {segment.id}")
        plt.legend()
        plt.grid(True)
        plt.tight_layout()
        plt.show()
